<!-- @generated by usage-cli from usage spec -->
# `biwa init`

- **Usage**: `biwa init [-f --force] [--format <FORMAT>]`

Initialize a new configuration file

## Flags

### `-f --force`

Force overwrite if file exists

### `--format <FORMAT>`

Format to generate (toml, json, jsonc, json5, yaml, yml)

**Default:** `toml`
